name: counterintuitive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Something that is counterintuitive does not happen in the way you would expect it to: It may seem counterintuitive to open a shop in the middle of a recession. Steering a sailboat is counter-intuitive - you push the tiller the opposite way to the way you want to go. His careful and counterintuitive analysis of the market brought him great success.
More examplesFewer examplesIt seems like a counterintuitive way to run a business.He steered the company in a surprising direction and made some counterintuitive choices.This decision might sound counter-intuitive now, but it worked.
